info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: envergo.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 Found
Connection: close
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Date: Sun, 02 Oct 2022 03:02:29 GMT
Location: /simulateur/
Referrer-Policy: same-origin
Set-Cookie: visitorid=8346e82f-45fa-4db9-998e-3302c464b010; expires=Fri, 27 Oct 2023 03:02:29 GMT; HttpOnly; Max-Age=33696000; Path=/; SameSite=Lax; Secure
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=60; includeSubDomains; preload
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Request-Id: cf90061e-ea9b-4f59-a454-478c22403325
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Length: 0

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 11328
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 11328
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 3688
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 3688
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4167
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4167
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"Sendinblue-code:c5d51deb8e89904a31a257428cd400a7"
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ?all"
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=oLxIvDBJWiRUJgw5wN49EbfZJB77sC_77K34WLlubpw"

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: envergo.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 02 Oct 2022 03:06:56 GMT Referrer-Policy: same-origin Set-Cookie: visitorid=a7162f41-2211-411e-ae34-5286fa03687f; expires=Fri, 27 Oct 2023 03:06:56 GMT; HttpOnly; Max-Age=33696000; Path=/; SameSite=Lax; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=60; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Request-Id: 02a19596-8b82-48df-b6c0-60debd1394e7 X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 403 Forbidden

Interdit (403)

La vérification CSRF a échoué. La requête a été interrompue.

Vous voyez ce message parce que ce site HTTPS exige que le navigateur Web envoie un en-tête « Referer », ce qu’il n'a pas fait. Cet en-tête est exigé pour des raisons de sécurité, afin de s’assurer que le navigateur n’ait pas été piraté par un intervenant externe.

Si vous avez désactivé l’envoi des en-têtes « Referer » par votre navigateur, veuillez les réactiver, au moins pour ce site ou pour les connexions HTTPS, ou encore pour les requêtes de même origine (« same-origin »).

Si vous utilisez la balise <meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer"> ou que vous incluez l’en-tête « Referrer-Policy: no-referrer », il est préférable de les enlever. La protection CSRF exige que l’en-tête ``Referer`` effectue un contrôle de référant strict. Si vous vous souciez de la confidentialité, utilisez des alternatives comme <a rel="noreferrer" …> pour les liens vers des sites tiers.

Des informations plus détaillées sont affichées lorsque la variable DEBUG vaut True.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: envergo.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://envergo.beta.gouv.fr/'
